name: test_e2e_with_logs[055_SQLI_BYPASS_006]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_BYPASS_006` |
| **Name** | Pipe character bypass |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | bypass_waf |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `'||UNION||SELECT||version(),NULL,NULL--`
- **Encoded**: `'%7C%7CUNION%7C%7CSELECT%7C%7Cversion()%2CNULL%2CNULL--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~55000ms
- **Timestamp**: 14:27:52.000 UTC

| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |
